Articles.Content:
Dear Ladies and Gentlemen,

The Waffle Space Agency proudly presents to you our latest development: The Waffle Moon Station!

After minutes of research we can now launch our first permanent Moon Station.

Due to the lack of processing power in our Space Center (and because we killed all our other pilots), we are looking for a brave crew to test our craft and (hopefully) land it safely on the moon.

The station is equipped with the latest micro-nuclear-power-cells which allow for 2000 years of constant power supply. No need for solar panels! (Warning, radiation may cause unknown side-effects)

There are 3 separate living quarters with bathrooms and comfortable beds on board. A whooping 42 rooms are available to decorate free at your will! Use it for anything you can dream of. Now with emergency escape module!

Order your moon station now and get a sewage pipe free on top! Pictures and links below

Download Waffle Moon-Station.craft

(NOTE: The upper stage that looks like booster rockets is actually the station. It detaches from the giant rockets)

If you tested the ship, a recorded video or screenshots would be nice. I can't test it myself because the lagg makes it uncontrollable. If you cannot make screenshots or videos a simple testresult in this thread would be great! Thanks a lot and have fun!

Note: All vanilla parts. No mods used.

Hi McWaffel and welcome to the community

Thats an impressive ship, nice work, how about some pics of that beast in flight and on the Mun?

Thanks for the nice welcome

My computer isn't good enough to fly the rocket. I can't really fly it to the Mun... That's why I'm asking people to test it for me
i will test it for you and pm you the results
